tool_description:
Screener for stock candlestick patterns & indicator signals. 
Screening 21 candlestick patterns & 6 indicator signals (supertrend, macd, rsi)
name: BarPatterns
title: BarPatterns

api_list.name: Macd Crossover Down
api_list.description: List of stocks having Macd crossover down signal.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://barpatterns.p.rapidapi.com/screener/indicator/macd-crossover-down/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "barpatterns.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://barpatterns.p.rapidapi.com/screener/indicator/macd-crossover-down/{page}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "barpatterns.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://barpatterns.p.rapidapi.com/stock/information/{page}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "barpatterns.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
